content: speaker mentions registries... I do quite a bit of work with them; esp. NAACCR (cancer). Anybody else doing registry stuff?

There is an HL7 Project Called Common Clinical Registry Framework that is beginning to look at how FHIR could be used to support the work - https://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=467

Da Vinci also has a project around Data Exchange for Quality Measures that we believe could support registries - http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-deqm/index.html

Both groups have calls you can find on the HL7 Conference Call calendar. Hope this helps.
